props.name: target
props.docblock: specifies where the link should open. The default behavior is `_self`, which means that the URL will be loaded into the same browsing context as the current one. If the target is `_blank` (opening a new window) `rel='noopener'` will be added to the anchor tag to prevent any potential [reverse tabnabbing attack](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Reverse_Tabnabbing).

description.text: specifies where the link should open. The default behavior is `_self`, which means that the URL will be loaded into the same browsing context as the current one. If the target is `_blank` (opening a new window) `rel='noopener'` will be added to the anchor tag to prevent any potential [reverse tabnabbing attack](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Reverse_Tabnabbing).

props.name: onClick
props.docblock: specifies the callback function when the link is clicked

description.text: specifies the callback function when the link is clicked

props.name: externalLinkAlternativeText
props.docblock: specifies the text for links with a `_blank` target (which loads the URL in a new browsing context).

description.text: specifies the text for links with a `_blank` target (which loads the URL in a new browsing context).

props.name: externalLinkTitle
props.docblock: specifies the title for links with a `_blank` target (which loads the URL in a new browsing context).

description.text: specifies the title for links with a `_blank` target (which loads the URL in a new browsing context).

frontmatter.title: Hyperlink
frontmatter.notes:
Improve prop naming. Deprecate content prop.
Use React.forwardRef for ref forwarding.
